bpr.cover.notfound: A document linked to the resource is no longer available. Publication to the library is not possible.
bpr.form.publication.description.placeho: What topics are covered in your activity? What educational goals are you trying to achieve?
bpr.form.publication.licence.text.1: I agree to publish my activity under the Creative Commons license
bpr.form.publication.licence.text.2: I accept that I will be as the author and that the name of my school and a description of my profile will be displayed. This will help teachers within the community connect with you more easily.
bpr.form.publication.licence.text.3: If your resource includes comments, they will not be published in the library.
bpr.form.publication.response.error.cont: Please try again. Contact customer support if the problem continues.
bpr.form.publication.response.success.co: Nice work! Your activity will help inspire other teachers in the community.
Feel free to take a look at other activities and strike up a conversation with other teachers!

bpr.form.tip: The Library is a space where you can share activities and digital resources with other teachers.

empty.blog.consultation: No blogs have been posted yet. But don’t worry! This page will be full of amazing posts in no time.
empty.blog.consultation.title: It's a bit quiet around these parts...
empty.blog.creation: Are you setting off on a linguistic adventure? Want to share your experiences with the class? Time to dust off your intrepid reporter hat! Working alone or in a group, you can easily publish and share text, photos, and videos.
empty.blog.creation.title: Create your very first blog!
empty.blog.filter: There are no results. Check new filters to bring up your blogs.
empty.blog.subfolder.title: This folder is empty...
empty.calendar: Leave your USB keys in their drawers! The Share Big Files app lets you store your large documents online and open them anywhere for 30 days.
empty.calendar.consultation: No one has shared a calendar with you yet. Might as well kick up your feet and relax!
empty.calendar.consultation.title: It's almost like vacation...
empty.calendar.creation: With the Calendar app, you can manage your schedule, create events, invite participants, and check on your meetings.
empty.calendar.creation.title: Organize your day like a pro!
empty.collaborativeeditor.consultation: With the Collaborative Editor app, you can easily help create a class or presentation and chat about it with others via a chat window. In short, you can’t do without it!
empty.collaborativeeditor.consultation.t: Work together no matter where, no matter when!
empty.collaborativeeditor.creation: Do you have a group project due in a week? With the Collaborative Editor pad, you can work together on the same document at the same time and easily share tips through the chat function. Ready to get started?
empty.collaborativeeditor.creation.title: Work together no matter where, no matter when!
empty.collaborativewall.consultation: The Collaborative Wall is a virtual and interactive board. It’s the perfect way to organize your ideas or simply keep them all in one place. Like its name suggests, several people can work on it at once!
empty.collaborativewall.creation: The Collaborative Wall is a virtual and interactive board. It’s the perfect way to organize your ideas or simply keep them all in one place. Like its name suggests, several people can work on it at once!
empty.collaborativewall.creation.title: For the avid Post-It user
empty.conversation: With the Mailbox app, you can reach out to other members of your network.
empty.conversation.title: No messages in sight...
empty.filters: Whoops, you’ve unchecked all the filters. Select a heading to access its content.
empty.filters.title: Who turned out all the lights?
empty.forum.consultation: Have some comic books to suggest to the school library? Want to share study tips or say what you thought about the last philosophy class? You can take part in rich and constructive conversations through the forum!
empty.forum.consultation.title: No conversations yet...
empty.forum.creation: Need some inspiration for your next field trips? Looking for suggestions for new additions to the library? Create a category, share it with the bright minds around you, and start a discussion to get some great ideas!
empty.forum.creation.title: Create discussion spaces for your network
empty.mindmap.consultation: The Mental Map helps transform ideas into structured diagrams. Whether you’re working with book notes, taking notes on a lecture, or creating an oral presentation, this tool will help you memorize the information more easily.
empty.mindmap.consultation.title: A map to help your ideas grow!
empty.mindmap.creation: Are you tired of forgetting all those million-dollar ideas? The Mental Map app lets you not only write them down, but also add any thoughts that come after! Give it a try!
empty.mindmap.creation.title: Good ideas are just around the corner!
empty.pages.consultation: Who said only coding geniuses can make websites? With the Pages app, you can create and publish content easily on a public or private website!
empty.pages.consultation.title: Mini website all to yourself (well, almost)
empty.pages.creation: You don’t have to be a coding whizz to create a website with Pages! Simply drag and drop blocks on content. Make it public or private—it’s all up to you!
empty.pages.creation.title: Create your own websites in a few clicks
empty.pages.subfolder.title: This folder is empty...
empty.rack.consultation: The Rack application lets you submit homework. Careful, though...once you submit a file to a teacher's personal Rack, you can no longer change your answers. Still ready? Submit away!
empty.rack.consultation.title: Submit your work with just one click
empty.rack.creation: No documents here! You haven't submitted anything yet. Time to get to work!
empty.rack.creation.title: Nothing to see here...
empty.schoolbook.child: Your child's teacher hasn't written a message in his or her schoolbook yet
empty.schoolbook.consultation: With the digital schoolbook, teachers can easily share key information with you and read your replies in just a few clicks of the mouse!
empty.schoolbook.consultation.title: There aren't any messages in your schoolbook right now.
empty.schoolbook.creation: Need to communicate with your students’ parents? Send them a message through the digital schoolbook! You can receive read receipts and authorize parents to respond to you directly. This tool is a simple and effective way to reach out.
empty.schoolbook.creation.title: Time to write your first message!
empty.schoolbook.shared: Write a message and allow your peers to manage the task with you. Whether you’re tracking reading progress, sending reminders, or printing coupons, everything is easier when you’re working on it together!
empty.schoolbook.shared.title: There aren't any shared messages right now.
empty.scrapbook.consultation: Be sure to check out the Scrapbook. This interactive slideshow can include text, sounds, illustrations, and video content.
empty.scrapbook.consultation.title: Hold your horses! No content has been added yet.
empty.scrapbook.creation: Use the Scrapbook to bring your classes and presentations to life. Add text, sound, images, and video to this smart notebook!
empty.scrapbook.creation.title: Nothing to see here. Time to make your first Scrapbook
empty.scrapbook.subfolder.title: This folder is empty...
empty.search: No search results. Want to try again?
empty.search.title: We came up empty.
empty.sharebigfiles.consultation: The Share Big Files app lets you view even the largest documents shared by your network.
empty.sharebigfiles.creation: USB keys are a thing of the past! The Share Big Files app lets you store large documents online and open them from anywhere for 30 days.
empty.sharebigfiles.title: Send your documents to the cloud.
empty.timeline.consultation: Merovingian, Carolingians, Capetians…a long line of dynasties held the French throne. But who came first? With Timeline, you can memorize events in a flash!
empty.timeline.consultation.title: It's a great way to keep everything straight!
empty.timeline.creation: The Timeline app isn’t just a one-trick pony. You can use it to make interactive timelines, lay out a biography, or create a journal for your projects. Tons of options to choose from!
empty.timeline.creation.title: It's a great way to keep everything straight!
empty.timeline.notifications: Leah published a blog post, Enzo shared a Mindmap with you, and Chloe wrote a message in the forum. All your notifications will soon appear in this Newsfeed.
empty.timeline.notifications.nofilters: Oops! You’ve unchecked all your filters. Select your favorite sections to view your most important notifications!
empty.timeline.notifications.nofilters.t: Who turned out all the lights?
empty.timeline.notifications.noresults: No results. Check new filters to display your notifications.
empty.timeline.notifications.noresults.t: Who turned out all the lights?
empty.timeline.notifications.title: Where did everyone go?
empty.timeline.subfolder.title: This folder is empty...
empty.trash1: Zero. That's how many things are in this trashcan.
empty.trash2: Uhh...what are you looking for? Your trashcan is empty.
empty.trash3: Lesson no. 1: an empty trashcan can always double as a basketball hoop.
empty.trash4: Empty (noun): A space that is not occupied by matter. Example: Your trashcan is empty.
empty.trash5: Nothing to see here...not even the hint of a document in this trashcan.
empty.wiki.consultation: For those who like to share their encyclopedic knowledge, the Wiki application is for you! You can create content on your own or as a group.
empty.wiki.consultation.title: Welcome to the Wiki
empty.wiki.creation: Do you love sharing your encyclopedic knowledge? This application was made for you! Whether you’re an expert or a novice, you can create pages, add contributors (or not), and write content! Ready to try it out?
empty.wiki.creation.title: Create your Wiki
empty.workspace: Welcome to your Filespace, an area in the cloud that lets you store all your resources online. Upload or download documents, add comments, and share them with other members in your network!
empty.workspace.apps: Did you add a dozen photos directly to your Blog and now you want to reuse them? No worries! You’ll find them all neatly stored here.
empty.workspace.apps.title: Whoops, there's nothing on the shelf...
empty.workspace.shared: Here, you can find all the documents you’ve shared with other people as well as documents that have been shared with you. Sharing is caring!
empty.workspace.shared.title: Whoops, there's nothing on the shelf...
empty.workspace.subfolder.title: This folder is empty...
empty.workspace.title: You don't have any documents yet. Let's change that!

portal.pulsar.account: The "My account" page lets you update your profile (email, photo, telephone number, etc.) and preferences (email refresh frequency). You can also consult your notifications history.
portal.pulsar.apps: The My Apps page lists the school’s digital services. You can find all the applications here!
portal.pulsar.help: The online help feature is your friend. Not sure about something or have a question? Take a look at the instructions for the app you are using.
